text: Allah Taalaa misal biyan farma raha hai aik woh shaks jiss mien boht say bahum zidd rakhney walay saajhi hain aur doosra woh shaks jo sirf aik hi ka (ghulam) hai kiya yeh dono sift mein yaksan hain Allah Taalaa hi kay liye sab tareef hai. Baat yeh hai kay inn mein say aksar log samajhtay nahi
